UI, UX or Interaction design practitioners seeking advanced training or formal qualification in Interaction Design
Software engineers and front-end developers interested in up-skilling themselves in the area of Interaction Design
Design graduates and practitioners seeking advanced training or looking to move laterally into the Interaction Design discipline.
Age : 20 years and above.
